column5: I'm after walleye with this one

Have you informed the Walleye of this? Sometimes the targeted species don' know they're supposed to bite a certain lure and other species think it's perfectly ok to bite it... you ned to sit these fish down and have a talk with them!  That is a beautiful lure Keram!!!
You make me think Glen. I can still write down on it "FOR wallete only"  . Only problem is the language
Excellent job keram   A real beaut and good luck catching eyes.  Leechman
Aww yer not gonna get that lure all wet slimey and riddled with tooth marks now are ya? It's too purdy!
Great craftsmanship bud !!!!.  ..im sure it will work,good-luck...cheers
nice ideas.   Is that a turned acrylic pen blank?
Very nice Keram how do you get those fish scale patterns on the lure .Is that to secret.
I think if you intend to use this lure for walleye, you will catch anything but walleye lol. That's just the way it is. LOL  Amazing looking lure!
Beautiful craftmanship and love the color pattern you chose! Look forward to seeing a post with that hanging out of monster Eye toothy yap!  Cheers, 1leg
